data.lyric:
[ti:Bad Man (Smooth Criminal) (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Bad Man (Smooth Criminal) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bad Man (Smooth Criminal) (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:01.33]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett/Larrance Dopson/Anthony Jermaine White/Michael Jackson
[00:03.42]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett/Larrance Dopson/Anthony Jermaine White/Michael Jackson
[00:05.51]Lil Capalot b***h ha
[00:08.41]Smooth criminal Mike Jack
[00:09.80]And I still like to tote a .45 like Mike back
[00:12.24]Pull that TEC out just to make a statement
[00:14.28]He gon' need a body bag or a night sack
[00:16.26]He a b***h he'll fold under pressure
[00:18.00]I can tell from his posture man he ain't really like that
[00:20.24]Mama told me "I don't care if you scared
[00:21.78]Go in for the kill if they try you better fight back"
[00:24.03]We'll beat his a*s if he try to throw the folks up
[00:26.16]What's all that s**t you was sayin' like you was so tough
[00:28.00]They gon' have to carry your mans if he approach us
[00:30.06]Creepin' in that glizzy'll blam when we get close up
[00:32.18]Rich-a*s gangster my gun match the color of my car
[00:34.53]Any sudden movement and this b***h go "Fah fah"
[00:37.04]Bet I have him huggin' Allah
[00:38.24]I'm the G.O.A.T. I'm a thug I'm a star
[00:40.36]Youngin' tryna clear a crowd with the heat
[00:41.76]When you ridin' better keep a .40 cal' by the seat
[00:43.97]He was bangin' wrong 'til they found him deceased
[00:45.74]It's a whole lot of evil roamin' 'round in the streets uh
[00:48.26]So you better look both ways make your soul shake
[00:50.75]Demons standin' in the doorway
[00:52.23]Tell me Annie are you okay
[00:53.54]Screamin' out "No way"
[00:54.72]Tell me Annie are you okay
[00:56.21]Still on that bulls**t MJ
[00:57.43]
[00:58.03]Really one of the hottest and I never dropped a mixtape
[01:00.20]All my life had to risk-take
[01:01.73]But if they come and try me .40 kickin' 'til my wrist break
[01:04.29]Let anybody in this b***h play
[01:05.66]I'ma have my C's leave his a*s in the ground with a stiff face
[01:08.20]Where I'm from all the killers turn hood legend
[01:10.24]And they known through them blocks like Dikembe
[01:12.18]Totin' on something bigger than The Great Khali
[01:14.27]Thirty shots'll knock him down like Muhammad Ali
[01:16.28]Do the race scratch off in a Trackhawk Jeep
[01:18.29]Catch him lackin' then it's R.I.P. b***h
[01:20.44]Youngin' tryna clear a crowd with the heat
[01:21.81]When you ridin' better keep a .40 cal' by the seat
[01:23.89]He was bangin' wrong 'til they found him deceased
[01:25.73]It's a whole lot of evil roamin' 'round in the streets uh
[01:28.17]So you better look both ways make your soul shake
[01:30.74]Demons standin' in the doorway
[01:32.22]Tell me Annie are you okay
[01:33.56]Screamin' out "No way"
[01:34.68]Tell me Annie are you okay
data.trans:
[ti:Bad Man (Smooth Criminal) (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Bad Man (Smooth Criminal) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.33]//
[00:03.42]//
[00:05.51]（Polo G的昵称）
[00:08.41]犯罪高手 就像Michael Jackson的那首歌一样
[00:09.80]我依然喜欢带着0.45口径的枪 就像身穿45号球衣的Michael Jordan重返赛场一样
[00:12.24]掏出TEC冲锋枪 只是为了表明态度
[00:14.28]他死到临头 需要裹尸袋或者睡袋装尸体
[00:16.26]他软弱无能 他会屈服于重压之下
[00:18.00]我能从他的姿势中分辨出来 他不是那种顶天立地的男子汉
[00:20.24]妈妈告诉我 我并不在乎你是否害怕
[00:21.78]大开杀戒 如果他们挑衅你 你最好予以还击
[00:24.03]如果他敢伤及无辜 我们会狠狠教训他一顿
[00:26.16]你在胡说八道些什么 好像你凶狠彪悍似的
[00:28.00]如果他敢靠近我们 他们会干掉你的人
[00:30.06]悄然行动 当我们靠近时扣动扳机
[00:32.18]腰缠万贯的匪徒 我的枪跟车子是同样的颜色
[00:34.53]胆敢轻举妄动 这个家伙必死无疑
[00:37.04]我打赌我送他去见上帝
[00:38.24]我是史上最强 我是个匪徒 我是个明星
[00:40.36]年轻人想拿着武器 驱散人群
[00:41.76]当你驾车驰骋时 最好把0.40口径的枪放在座位上
[00:43.97]他一直过着刀口舔血的生活 直到他们发现他死于非命
[00:45.74]一大帮恶魔在街上四处游荡
[00:48.26]所以你最好环顾四周 时刻保持警惕
[00:50.75]魔鬼伫立在门口
[00:52.23]请告诉我 Annie 你还好吗
[00:53.54]大声呐喊着 没门
[00:54.72]请告诉我 Annie 你还好吗
[00:56.21]依然全力以赴 就像Michael Jordan一样
[00:57.43]
[00:58.03]我是最受欢迎的说唱歌手之一 我从未发过混声带
[01:00.20]我这一生都必须放手一搏
[01:01.73]但如果他们胆敢挑衅我 我疯狂开枪 直到我手腕骨折
[01:04.29]让所有人都放马过来吧
[01:05.66]我让帮派里的兄弟动手 让他横尸街头
[01:08.20]在我的家乡 所有枪手都成为街头传奇
[01:10.24]他们靠着过硬的实力名声大噪 就像Dikembe一样
[01:12.18]手里拿着厉害的武器 比The Great Khali更具杀伤力
[01:14.27]三十发子弹将他击倒在地 就像Muhammad Ali一样
[01:16.28]开着吉普越野车一路狂飙
[01:18.29]攻其不备 然后他就小命不保
[01:20.44]年轻人想拿着武器 驱散人群
[01:21.81]当你驾车驰骋时 最好把0.40口径的枪放在座位上
[01:23.89]他一直过着刀口舔血的生活 直到他们发现他死于非命
[01:25.73]一大帮恶魔在街上四处游荡
[01:28.17]所以你最好环顾四周 时刻保持警惕
[01:30.74]魔鬼伫立在门口
[01:32.22]请告诉我 Annie 你还好吗
[01:33.56]大声呐喊着 没门
[01:34.68]请告诉我 Annie 你还好吗
